title: Stroke Organizations
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

sections.heading: Related Website: American Stroke Association
content: American Stroke Association : This division of the American Heart Association offers support, information, and more.

content_blocks.text: American Stroke Association : This division of the American Heart Association offers support, information, and more.

sections.heading: Related Website: Centers for Disease Control
content: Centers for Disease Control : The CDC offers facts and statistics on stroke.

sections.heading: Related Website: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke
content: The National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke , a division of the National Institutes of Health, offers information about research on stroke.

content_blocks.text: The National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke , a division of the National Institutes of Health, offers information about research on stroke.

sections.heading: Related Website: National Stroke Association
content: The National Stroke Association devotes all its resources to stroke. Supported by major pharmaceutical and medical device makers, it offers information and support to patients, caregivers, and medical professionals.
